mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS newPost , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_user WHERE DATE(intime)=CURDATE() AND status=0) AS newMember, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_active_part WHERE DATE(intime)=CURDATE()) AS newActivityApply, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_orders WHERE DATE(paytime)=CURDATE() AND isdel=0) AS newOrderForm, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_audit_vip_detail WHERE userid = (SELECT id FROM yw_user WHERE DATE(applydate)=CURDATE())) AS applyForNotAudit FROM yw_post WHERE date(intime)=curdate() AND isdel=0 AND isactive=0

SELECT COUNT(1) AS addVExamine, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE isself=1 AND isdel=0) AS selfSupportGoods, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE isself=0 AND isdel=0) AS tripartiteGoods, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE stock<10 AND isdel=0) AS inventoryWarning, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE ishot=1 AND isdel=0) AS sellLikeHotCakesGoods, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE stock=0) AS noStock, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE isspecial=1 AND isdel=0) AS promotionItem, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE isdel=1) AS soldOut, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE isdel=0) AS goodsQuantity, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_orders WHERE status=1 AND isdel=0) AS dropShipping, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_orders WHERE status=0 AND isdel=0) AS tobepaid, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_orders o WHERE o.status=2 AND o.isdel=0 AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_afterservice WHERE orderid=o.ordernumber)=0) AS deliverGoods, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_afterservice WHERE afterstatue=2 AND aftersalestatus=1 AND processingstatus=2 AND isdel=1) AS refund, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_afterservice WHERE afterstatue=1 AND aftersalestatus=1 AND processingstatus=2 AND isdel=1) AS salesReturn, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_orders WHERE isdel=0 AND status <> 0 AND status <> -1) AS orderQuantity FROM yw_apply_vip_detail WHERE apply_level=0

SELECT COUNT(1) AS posts, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_orders WHERE isdel=0) AS orders, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_goods WHERE isdel=0) AS goods, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_user WHERE status=0 AND level>0) AS vip, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM yw_post WHERE isdel=0 AND isactive=0 AND isessencepool=1) AS quintessence FROM yw_post WHERE isdel=0 AND isactive=0
